title: Dangers in deleting Duplicate files in League of Legends Directory.
body:
I was wondering if I could delete duplicate files that I found using the duplicate finder s/w.
I keep finding the same files in releases folder and I am asking whether I could delete the prev releases folder.
Would deleting previous release folders affect the patching or the game itself?
I am deleting these files to reduce the time to scan while updating and save the much needed very significant 100Mb out of my 100 Gb free space{{champion:427}}

replies.body: I wouldn't recommend removing anything from your League directory.  It may force your patcher to rescan your game files and repair them anyway.  Once everyone has transitioned nicely over the to the updated client, the devs will begin [removing old legacy files](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/features/client-beta-update-2-replacing-legacy-client-1) which will free up more space.  Hang tight until then!
